reviewText: I love this. My favorite special of all time. Watched it as a kid in 6th grade, and never looked at commercials the same way ever again. This should be mandatory for every kid to watch.

I love this!! I 've been looking for this video for years! So happy I found it! This is the HBO special that starred Jim Fyfe of Encyclopedia (Also a show I've been looking for if anyone knows where to find it) It tells you the "inside" info on commercials, admittedly it's a bit dated with info about 900 numbers but still most is relevant and a good watch.
